import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./IlkOnbir.css"; import Altay from "./PlayersPics/altay-fb1.jpeg"; import Serdar from "./PlayersPics/SerdarAziz.jpeg"; import Simon from "./PlayersPics/Simon Falette.jpg"; import Nabil from "./PlayersPics/Nabil Dirar.jpeg"; import Hasan from "./PlayersPics/Hasan Ali Kaldirim.jpeg"; import Emre from "./PlayersPics/Emre.jpeg"; import Luiz from "./PlayersPics/Luis Gustavo.jpeg"; import Ozan from "./PlayersPics/Ozan Tufan.jpeg"; import Deniz from "./PlayersPics/Deniz türüç.jpeg"; import Gary from "./PlayersPics/Gary.jpeg"; import Tolga from "./PlayersPics/Tolga.jpeg"; import Ferdi from "./PlayersPics/Ferdi.jpeg"; import Mevlut from "./PlayersPics/Mevlüt.jpeg"; import Vedat from "./PlayersPics/Vedat.jpeg"; export default class IlkOnbir extends Component { state = { info: false, btn: true, players: [ { id: 1, name: "Altay Bayindir", age: "21", mevki: "Kaleci", source: require("./PlayersPics/altay-fb1.jpeg"), }, { id: 2, name: "Serdar Aziz", age: "29", mevki: "Stoper", source: require("./PlayersPics/SerdarAziz.jpeg") }, ], }; showInfo = (id) => { this.setState({ info: !this.state.info, btn: !this.state.btn}); }; render() { const hideInfo = this.state.info; const pl = this.state.players.map((player) => { return (

this.showInfo()} class="btn effect04" data-sm-link-text="INFO" > {this.state.btn === true ? "SHOW" : "HIDE"}

{hideInfo === true ? (

{player.name}

{player.age}

{player.mevki}

) : ( "" )}
); }); return (
{pl} {/*

: "" }

); } }
